result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cody Ricarte Deocares

records.addlTxt:
11:36 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Cody Ricarte Deocares in court.  Attorney T. Gregory Amann in court for Cody Ricarte Deocares.  Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Amann states DE called him and said he'd be here any minute.  DE now appears at 11:37 AM.  Court reviews file. Atty Amann states he believes this matter will likely settle, needs a few weeks.  DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 11:39 AM. bph
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on November 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Per SRN, suspend Sep & Oct attorney fee payments.  Reinstate PP to comm Nov 15, 2022, $100 per month. cah
Unpaid September 15 & October 15, 2022, attorney fees.  ($100.00 due per month)  This person may be released upon the payment of $200.00

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, A. Holmberg, except for Court proceedings. The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

8:30 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Cody Ricarte Deocares in court, in custody.  Attorney T. Gregory Amann in court for Cody Ricarte Deocares.  Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews bail modification request filed by DE.  Atty Amann states DE is not on PO hold.  DE confirms address on file.  Bond argument.  Court modifies bond.  Adjourned at 8:34 AM. bph
Bail/bond hearing on October 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

10:55 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Cody Ricarte Deocares in court, in custody.  Attorney T. Gregory Amann in court for Cody Ricarte Deocares.  Attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for State of Wisconsin. ADA Becker states an Information was filed.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Atty Amann states there is an update in regards to PO hold.  Speedy trial demand is not requested.  State to provide discovery within 10 business days. Bond continues in form and amount.  Adjourned at 11:04 AM. bph
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on October 25, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Order for payment on September 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

8:48  AM  Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: K Kittel.  Attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney T. Gregory Amann in court w/Cody Ricarte Deocares in court, in custody. S/T Officer Sam McGrane, Glenwood City PD; direct by Atty Becker. Record reflects identity of the DE. Cross by Atty Amann. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Court advises DE that when hold is lifted, may request a BBH. Attty Amann asks to set ARGN. Bond continues pending probation hold. Adjourned:  9:07 am
Arraignment scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Arraignment on September 12, 2022 at 11:00 am.

1:09 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Cody Ricarte Deocares in court, in custody.  Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Cody Ricarte Deocares.  Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  DE does not qualify for PD.  Court advises DE of attorney rights. DE given PFAC and advised to fill out forms right away.  DE confirms address.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  DE on PO hold.  ADA Becker states DE will be in custody until mid week next week. Bond argument. ADA Becker states there is a family case that addresses custody and child placement.  Court orders bond. Court advises DE can file something in family case to request change in custody agreement.  If DE is out of custody, DE to be here in person for next hearing. Adjourned at 1:26 PM. bph
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 9, 2022 at 08:45 am.
